reviews.author: Oliver
reviews.headline: I love this product!
reviews.body: This sofa has completely changed my life. The delivery process couldn't have been easier. I want to sing about Oliver Space from the rooftops!

reviews.author: new
reviews.headline: Love it
reviews.body: Would rent this big ol couch one hundred times over.

reviews.author: Gregory
reviews.headline: Best couch ever
reviews.body: Super comfortable and you could sit in it all day!

reviews.author: Harry
reviews.headline: Persian Rugs
reviews.body: The rug is washable and beautiful. I want to buy 14 more for my house.

reviews.author: Rey
reviews.headline: Super late delivery
reviews.body: We had to wait 5 months for the chair to arrive, and it's much smaller than pictured. Need refund!!!

reviews.author: Arian
reviews.headline: So-So
reviews.body: It's a very bland bed but it does the job.
